overview: Ten years ago, the DB multinational studio's "Hero Improvement Project" was secretly implemented, and the only inquisitive body of the first generation machine, 001, accidentally escaped from the base with amnesia and, ten years later, is playing the role of a film icon with flamboyant acting skills - Squadron. Old superheroes have been replaced by alien heroes, and Squadron is no exception. Disillusioned with his life, Squadron spends his days drinking. By chance, Squadron discovers a powerful force within himself and takes up the mission of restoring the heroes
title: Chinese Captain
